Description

Problem is as sample as it looks you just have to decode the keyboard.
You have to give output of corresponding key pressed on numpad.
Note:Key 1 outputs whitespace.



1 
2abc
3def

4ghi
5jkl
6mno

7pqrs
8tuv
9wxyz

* 
0space
# 


Input
First line of input contains N number of test case.
Next line contains numeric input.

Example
Sample Input:

3
213
332
223


Sample Output:
a d
ea
bd



Warning: large Input/Output data, be careful with certain languages
